document_data.caption: A map showing Rejviik's Mortuary outlined in red.
document_data.name: Rejviik's Mortuary
document_data.mainbody: '''Rejviik's Mortuary''' was a business located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The building stood three stories tall.
document_data.Location: Rejviik's Mortuary was located in the northern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] near the outer wall of the [[Waterdeep/City of the Dead|City of the Dead]] where [[Ironpost Street]] meet [[Zendulth Street]].
